open.title: Openserve Outage | All Regions
open.description: We are investigating reports of limited connectivity affecting clients on the Openserve network. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: Afrihost engineers have made changes to mitigate the impact and are monitoring for stability. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

Afrihost Engineers continue to work on the ongoing intermittent to no connectivity issues for some Afrihost clients on the Openserve Network. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.
We continue to work towards a solution for the ongoing intermittent to no connectivity issues for some Afrihost clients on Openserve

Afrihost network engineers are still actively troubleshooting the ongoing intermittent to no connectivity issues Openserve clients are experiencing. We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience caused.
Afrihost engineers are actively working on resolving the ongoing intermittent connection issue experienced by Openserve clients. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

open.title: Clear Access outage | Johannesburg South
open.description: Clear Access has informed us of a network outage affecting Johannesburg South, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Clear Access engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

open.title: Openserve Maintenance | National
open.description: Openserve is conducting national maintenance from 00:00 22 May 2024 users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
